title: If God Wanted Us to Travel...
description: David Brenner is one of America's best-known and best-loved comedians and author of bestselling humor book Soft Pretzels with Mustard. Now he brings his fans a hilarious look at the ups and downs of traveling. If God Wanted Us to Travel . . . is packed with outrageous observations, hilarious anecdotes and timely tips.
author: David Brenner
